reviews.name: Elena Jusenlijska
reviews.comment: Nice little park nestled between a street full of restaurants.

reviews.name: Efe Kocasaraç
reviews.comment: Good park to sit in camping chairs.

reviews.name: Vasily Gurin
reviews.comment: Very nice little park in the middle of the district. Bunch of coffee shops nearby and a small off-leash dog area :)

reviews.name: Hussain Al Hashemi
reviews.comment: Nice Park for kids. They had a lot of fun

reviews.name: Saygın Karabay
reviews.comment: Great place to hangout with family and lots of cosy restaurants and cafes around the park.

reviews.name: Daniel “HarleyDan”
reviews.comment: Nice park to take kids.  Also great park to walk around.

reviews.name: Mustafa Sadiq
reviews.comment: nice and quiet park ... all kinds of sports you can do in it with vareity of kids play

reviews.name: Burak ARI
reviews.comment: Great park in the middle of a crowded neighborhood. Quiet and peaceful in the early morning, crowded rest of the day.
